name: Axolotl Feeding Simulator - demo
description:
A small and simple one button simulation of  "hand" feeding an Axolotl. 

the controls are only the spacebar

- press the spacebar shortly to get the the feeding sticks to move up and down

- hold down the space bar to rotate the feeding sticks

lol, sorry if it isn't much and if you can only feed it once (maybe take that as a challange and pretend that you are luring in the axolotl to aet and then quickly  backaway (: )
